GSD.description:
drm/meson: remove drm bridges at aggregate driver unbind time

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v6.0.3 by commit fc1fd114dde3d2623ac37676df3d74ffeedb0da8. For more details please see the references link.
